__prompts__.cronjob_name: Enter the name of the new cronjob to be deployed
__prompts__.cronjob_schedule: Enter the cron schedule for the cronjob: e.g. '0 7 * * 1' 7am every Monday
__prompts__.container_args: Enter the arguments to be passed to the container
__prompts__.ecr_aws_account_id: Enter the AWS account ID for the ECR repository
